titleStmt.title: A prophesie out of the nienth chapter of Esaie of the kingdome of Christe. with a frutefull and godlye exposition of D. Martin Luther: wherein is most excellently intreated of the conquest of Christe and of al his members, ouer sinne, death, and Satan, and of sundry other things most comfortable to be red, and no lesse necessary to be knovvne.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
Seton, Gregorie, d. 1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: By H. Bynneman, for Gregorie Seton, and are to be solde at the signe of the Hedgehog, at the vvest end of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A prophesie by Esay of Christ Iesus.
Signature G stained; some print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Hedgehog, at the vvest end of Paules
